original_title: Southwest announced yet another way it’s becoming just a regular airline | CNN Business
article_summary: Southwest Airlines, traditionally a domestic airline, is considering expanding to long-haul international flights for the first time, following the trend of rival carriers. The airline is exploring new international destinations on its Boeing 737 aircraft, but details about potential markets and timelines are yet to be disclosed. Negotiations with unions representing pilots and flight attendants are necessary before the new routes can be launched.</s>
